short_summary: Translation and edit/revision services for Net-Zero Advisory Body documents.
description: Purpose: The Net-Zero Advisory Body Secretariat in the Climate Change Branch (CBB) of Environment and Canada (ECCC) is seeking translation and edit/revision services. Objective: Obtain high-quality and timely translation services. Deliverables: Professional services for translation and edit/revision of documents.
full_summary:
### **Tender Announcement**

#### Background

A Tender Announcement for professional translation services has been issued by Environnement Canada, a branch of the Department of Environment and Climate Change. To ensure timely support to its newly established Net-Zero Advisory Body, Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking expert translation and editing/revision services for a variety of documents.

#### Objective

The primary goal of this project is for Environment and Climate Change Canada to obtain high-quality, timely, and consistent translation and editing/revision services for the Net-Zero Advisory Body. The translation documents will comprise various reports and Web content.

#### Solicitation Number and Reference Number

* Solicitation Number: 5000071496
* Reference Number: PW-23-01027762

#### Amendment and Addendum

This solicitation has undergone two modifications: an amendment dated February 27, 2023, and a further amendment on March 9, 2023.

#### Key Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 28 March 2023, at 3:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Amendment Date: 9 March 2023

#### Electronic Procurement System

The Tender Announcement and any subsequent modifications can be accessed through the Government of Canada’s electronic procurement system, Buyandsell.gc.ca

### Attached Files 
#### Solicitation Document

The Solicitation Document for this project includes the following files:

* Solicitation document in English, dated February 24, 2023
* Amendment 1 (English and French) and Amendment 2 (English and French) dated February 27 and March 9, 2023, respectively.

Access the Solicitation Document and information regarding this project through Buyandsell.gc.ca

### Contact Information

If you require more information, contact Heidi Noble at heidi.noble@ec.gc.ca or by phone at [insert phone number, if available]. 

### About The Government of Canada's Electronic Procurement System

The Procuremental process for this project will be available through the Government of Canada's electronic procurement system, Buyandsell.gc.ca. This system is constructed to allow suppliers to find, bid, and contract with the government. The complete list of attached files may also be accessed there.
